ui.panel.page-onboarding.intro: Are you ready to awaken your home?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.dont_have_: Don't have an account? Sign up here!
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.already_ha: Already have an account? Login here!
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.intro_logi: Let's get started by logging in with your user account.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.intro_sign: Let's get started by creating a user account.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.data.name: Ad
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: Merhaba {name} , Home Assistant'a hoş geldin. Evini nasıl adlandırmak istersin?
We would like to know where you live. This information will help with displaying information and setting up sun-based automations. This data is never shared outside of your network.
We can help you fill in this information by making a one-time request to an external service.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.integration.int: Devices and services are represented in Cerebro as integrations. You can set them up now, or do it later from the configuration screen.
